profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.4 Version and conformance level identification - Conformance level
profile.description: Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B.

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is not equal to "B" for a PDF/A-2B conforming file.
